title: Air Products and Chemicals ' sales 2009 to 2019
summary: This statistic shows Air Products Chemicals Products Revenue between 2009 and 2019 .
Air Products Chemicals , Inc. is the largest industrial gases company in North and South America and one of the largest worldwide .
In 2019 , the corporation generated around 8919 million U.S. dollars of Revenue .
gold: This statistic shows the revenues of Air Products and Chemicals from 2009 to 2019.
Air Products and Chemicals , Inc. is a United States-based international corporation whose major business is selling gases and chemicals for industrial uses.
In 2019 , the company generated approximately 8.92 billion U.S. dollars of revenue .
